snippet: Emu oil, which comes from a block of fat that covers most of the bird’s body, has proved a boon for ranchers in an industry struggling with decline.
abstract: Emu oil, which comes from a block of fat that covers most of flightless bird’s body, has proved boon for ranchers in industry struggling with decline; emu farms and ranches have fallen to 1,000 to 2,000 from 5,500 in 1998; low sales of emu meat have improved, but oil's popularity has kept more ranches from closing.
lead_paragraph: Emu oil, which comes from a block of fat that covers most of the bird’s body, has proved a boon for ranchers in an industry struggling with decline.

headline.seo: Emu Oil Aids the Survival of an Unusual Industry
headline.main: Ranchers Find Hope in Flightless Bird’s Fat
headline.print_headline: Ranchers Find Hope In Flightless Bird’s Fat
